question:
Your local hospital has advertised for people to do unpaid work helping at the hospital. You would like to do some work at the hospital in your free time.
Write a letter to the hospital. In your letter
Explain why you would like to do unpaid work at the hospital
Say what type of unpaid work you would be able to do
give details of when you would be available
text: I am writing you with regard to your advertisement for volunteering. I will like to inform you that I am interested and will like to work for free in your hospital.

I will really love to do unpaid job because it really makes me happy and it is also my way of giving back to the society. I am a trained social worker who has great love to help people and I will love to volunteer for free on my free days because I prefer helping than being idle.

I would also like you to know that I can be of great help in the customer reception department because am excellent in customer interaction. Also, I would be of great help in coordinating workers in my shift to ensure everyone carry out their obligations.

My availability will be based on my work schedule. I don’t work on Tuesdays and Thursdays so I will be available to volunteer for free on these days with any time of your choice between morning and evening.
I look forward to receiving your response.
